snippet: The Dow also rose, but the Nasdaq was dragged down by investors less than enthralled by Apple’s new iPhones selling off shares of the company.
abstract: Stock market moves mostly higher, with Standard & Poor's 500-stock index rising for seventh straight day.
lead_paragraph: The Dow also rose, but the Nasdaq was dragged down by investors less than enthralled by Apple’s new iPhones selling off shares of the company.
